GUI_Trades.NoTradeMsg:
All trade requests have been answered
or no whisper has been received yet.

Right click on the tray icon
then [Settings] to set your preferences
GUI_Trades.NoGameInstanceMsg:
No game instance could be found,
scanning every 10 seconds...

Right click on the tray icon,
then [Settings] to set your preferences.
GUI_Trades.RMENU_CloseOtherTabsForSameItem: Close other tabs for same item

GUI_Settings.hBTN_TabSettingsMain_ToolTip: Contains settings deciding how should the tool behave.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_TabCustomizationSkins_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Customize the pre-existing skins.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_TabCustomizationButtons_ToolTip: Change actions and messages performed when clicking on buttons.
GUI_Settings.hIMG_GitHub_ToolTip: Visit the GitHub repository for this project.
GUI_Settings.hIMG_PoE_ToolTip: Visit the pathofexile.com thread for this project.
GUI_Settings.hCB_HideInterfaceWhenOutOfGame: Hide interface when tabbed out of game?
GUI_Settings.hCB_HideInterfaceWhenOutOfGame_ToolTip:
While tabbed out of the game, the interface will never be shown.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_MinimizeInterfaceToBottomLeft: Minimize interface to bottom left corner?
GUI_Settings.hCB_MinimizeInterfaceToBottomLeft_ToolTi:
Disabled: Minimizing the interface reduces it to its top-right corner.
Enabled: Minimizing the interface reduces it to its bottom-left corner.
Default : OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_CopyItemInfosOnTabChange: Copy item infos on tab change?
GUI_Settings.hCB_CopyItemInfosOnTabChange_ToolTip:
Copies the item name, for usage with the in-game stash search.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoFocusNewTabs_ToolTip:
Activates the newest tab when receiving a new trading whisper.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoMinimizeOnAllTabsClosed: Auto minimize once all tabs are closed?
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoMinimizeOnAllTabsClosed_ToolTip:
Closing the last remaining tab will automatically minimize the interface.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoMaximizeOnFirstNewTab: Auto maximize on first new tab?
GUI_Settings.hCB_AutoMaximizeOnFirstNewTab_ToolTip:
Creating the first tab will automatically maximize the interface.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_SendTradingWhisperUponCopyWhenHoldin:
Hold CTRL when copying trading
whisper to instantly send in game?

Instantly send the whisper in-game if you are holding CTRL
when clicking on poe.trade poapp.com copy whisper button.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_PlaySoundNotificationWhen_ToolTip: Allows to play a custom sound notification.
GUI_Settings.hCB_TradingWhisperSFXToggle_ToolTip:
Plays a custom sound notification upon receiving a trading whisper.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hCB_RegularWhisperSFXToggle_ToolTip:
Plays a custom sound notification upon receiving a regular non-trading whisper.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_BuyerJoinedAreaSFXToggle_Tooltip:
Plays a custom sound notification when one of your buyers joined your hideout.
Note that you need to be in your hideout already for this to work.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_ShowTabbedTrayNotificationOnWhisper:
Show a notification when receiving
a whisper while tabbed out of game?
GUI_Settings.hCB_ShowTabbedTrayNotificationOnWhisper_:
Shows a notification with name and whisper
if you receive a whisper while tabbed out of the game.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_PushBulletNotifications_ToolTip: Allows to receive notifications on mobile.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_PushBulletToken_ToolTip:
Your Pushbullet token, specific to your PushBullet account.
https://www.pushbullet.com/#settings/account
GUI_Settings.hCB_PushBulletOnTradingWhisper_ToolTip:
Sends a pusbullet notification upon receiving a trading whisper.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hCB_PushBulletOnWhisperMessage_ToolTip:
Sends a pusbullet notification upon receiving a regular non-trading whisper.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_PushBulletOnlyWhenAfk_ToolTip:
Sends a pusbullet notification only if you are AFK in game.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_POEAccountsList: POE Accounts list (Case sensitive, separate with comma):
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_POEAccountsList_ToolTip:
Your POE account names. Used for the automated price verify feature.
/!\ CASE SENSITIVE /!\
https://www.pathofexile.com/my-account
GUI_Settings.hCB_AllowClicksToPassThroughWhileInactiv:
Make the interface click-through
when all tabs are closed?

Allows to click behind the interface when all tabs are closed.
Best used with the transparency setting.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_NoTabsTransparency_ToolTip:
Transparency of the interface when all tabs have been closed.
Default: 0
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_TabsOpenTransparency_ToolTip:
Transparency of the interface when at least one tab is open.
Default: 100
GUI_Settings.hCB_ItemGridHideNormalTab_ToolTip:
Disables the bigger green square that shows the item location in a normal tab.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_ItemGridHideQuadTab_ToolTip:
Disables the smaller green square that shows the item location in a quad tab.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_ItemGridHideNormalTabAndQuadTabForMa: Disable normal and quad locations, for maps?

When the item is a map, hides both green squares
leaving only the blue square showing the location in a map stash tab.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_SkinBase_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Select the assets of the skin you would like to use.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_ScalingSize_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Increase or decrease the global size of the interface.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_TextFont_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Select the font you would like to use.
GUI_Settings.hCB_UseRecommendedFontSettings_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Allows to use different font size and quality.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_FontSize_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Decide the font size.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_FontQuality_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Decide the font quality.
Some fonts display better with a lower quality.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_TextColor_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Decide the font color for specific elements.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_RecreateTradesGUI: Click here to apply your changes now
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_ButtonsTabTopTip:
Left click to set the button behaviour - Right click for sizing options
Drag to change button slot (empty slot required)
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_ButtonsTabTopTip2:
You can use variables in your messages to indicate
buyer name (%buyer%), item name (%item%), item price (%price%)
GUI_Settings.hBTN_CustomBtn_1_ToolTip:
Left Click on this button to change its actions.
Right click for resizing, renaming, disabling.
Drag on an empty slot to move it.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_CustomBtnSlot_1_ToolTip: Empty button slot. Left click to add a button on this slot.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_UnicodeBtn_1_ToolTip:
Right click to change button action.
Drag on an empty slot to move it.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_UnicodeBtnSlot_1_ToolTip: Empty button slot. Left click to add a button on this slot.
GUI_Settings.hDDL_ActionType_ToolTip:
Actions list.
Choose the type of action that should be performed
when clicking on this button.
GUI_Settings.hEDIT_ActionContent_ToolTip:
Action content.
Input the message that should be sent with this action.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_SaveChangesToAction_ToolTip: Save the changes to one of the existing actions.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_AddAsNewAction_ToolTip: Save the changes as a new action.
GUI_Settings.hLV_ButtonsActions_ToolTip:
List of actions that will performed upon clicking this button.
Right click on an action allows to move it up/down or remove it.
GUI_Settings.hDDL_HotkeyActionType1_ToolTip:
Actions list.
Choose the type of action that should be performed
when pressing this hotkey.
GUI_Settings.hEDIT_HotkeyActionContent1_ToolTip:
Action content.
Input the message that should be sent with this action.
GUI_Settings.hEDIt_HotkeyAdvName_ToolTip: Input a profile name for this hotkey.
GUI_Settings.hHK_HotkeyAdvHotkey_ToolTip: Key combination for this hotkey profile.
GUI_Settings.hBTN_ChangeHKType_ToolTip:
/!\ ADVANCED USERS ONLY /!\
Change between the AHK Hotkey control or an EDIT box
to manually input your hotkey keys.
https://autohotkey.com/docs/Hotkeys.htm
https://autohotkey.com/docs/KeyList.htm
GUI_Settings.hLV_HotkeyAdvActionsList_ToolTip:
List of actions that will performed upon pressing this hotkey.
Right click on an action allows to move it up/down or remove it.
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_CheckForUpdatesWhen_ToolTip: Select when to check for updates.
GUI_Settings.hDDL_CheckForUpdate: Only on application start|On start + every 5 hours|On start + every day
GUI_Settings.hCB_UseBeta_ToolTip:
Agree to download BETA updates.
Default: OFF
GUI_Settings.hCB_DownloadUpdatesAutomatically_ToolTip:
Agree to download updates without asking.
Default: ON
GUI_Settings.hTEXT_About:
POE Trades Companion is a tool meant to enhance your trading experience.

Upon receiving a trading whisper (poe.trade / poeapp.com),
the most important informations from the trade will be shown in a convenient interface.

Up to nine custom buttons to interact with your buyer, five special smaller buttons to do
the strict minimum, and many hotkeys are available to make trading more enjoyable.

GUI_ChooseLang.hTEXT_TopText:
Thank you for using POE Trades Companion!
Before you can start trading,
please select your language below:

TrayNotifications.RecreatingTradesWindow_Msg: Recreating the trades interface with the new skin settings.
TrayNotifications.PositionHasBeenReset_Msg: The interface has been detected as out of bounds and has its position has been reset.
TrayNotifications.NoGameInstanceFound_Msg:
No running game instance could be found.
Make sure the game is running before trying again.
TrayNotifications.iSellStuffNotSaved_Title: This tab stats won't be saved
TrayNotifications.iSellStuffNotSaved_Msg: Tab stats with seller "iSellStuff" cannot not be saved.
TrayNotifications.GameWindowFocusTimedOut_Msg: Game window failed to be activated within 2 seconds, sending message canceled.
TrayNotifications.FailedToSendMessage_Msg: The clipboard failed to be updated in time. Message won't be sent. Make sure that no program is interfering with the clipboard.
TrayNotifications.GameLogsFileNotFound_Msg: The game logs file does not exist in this location: %file%
TrayNotifications.RestartingGameLogsMonitoring_Msg: An issue occurred while reading the logs file. Restarting the monitoring function.
TrayNotifications.ReachLeaguesAPIFail_Msg:
Failed to reach the leagues API.
Whispers from temporary leagues may appear incorrectly.

Retrying in %time% minutes.
TrayNotifications.ReachLeaguesAPIRetry_Title: Retrying to retrieve leagues from API...
TrayNotifications.ImageButtonDelayTest_Title: Too many fonts, may be slow to load
TrayNotifications.ImageButtonDelayTest_Msg:
Your system has more than 720 fonts installed.
On Windows 10, it is known to noticeably slow the tool startup
If the tool takes a long time to start, it is recommended to uninstall unused fonts from "%folder%".
TrayNotifications.MessageCanceledVarEmpty_Msg: Canceled from sending a message to %name% because this variable content is empty: "%variable%"
TrayNotifications.MessageCanceledVarTypo_Msg: Canceled from sending a message because the variable name is mistyped: %variable%
TrayNotifications.FailedToKickSelf_Title: Failed to kick self from party
TrayNotifications.FailedToKickSelf_Msg:
Account name missing.
Please provide your account name in the Settings.
TrayNotifications.ClipboardFailedToUpdate_Msg:
Unable to put the following content in the clipboard: "%message%".
A clipboard manager may be creating conflict.
TrayNotifications.FailedToRetrieveAccountCharacters_Msg: Unable to retrieve character list for account "%account%". Please make sure that your character list is set on public on your pathofexile.com profile.
TrayNotifications.ModeWindowEnabled_Msg: The trades interface can now be moved around.
TrayNotifications.ModeDockEnabled_Msg:
The trades interface will stay on the top right corner of your game window.
When running multiple instances of the game, if the interface is docking to the wrong game, use the "%cycleDock%" tray option.
TrayNotifications.NoUpdateFound_Msg:
Your version: %version%
Last stable: %stable%
Last beta: %beta%
TrayNotifications.ErrorOnUpdateCheck_Msg:
An error occurred when checking for updates
Please try again later or update manually.
TrayNotifications.UpdateAvailable_Msg:
Left click on this notification to start the automated updating process.
Right click to dismiss this notification.
TrayNotifications.UpdateSuccessful_Msg:
Successfully updated to v%version%
Take a look at the new changes!
TrayNotifications.AppLoaded_Msg: Right click on the tray icon to access Settings and more!
TrayNotifications.AppLoadedTransparency_Msg: Transparency is set to %number%. The interface will appear more transparent until you receive a trading whisper.
TrayNotifications.AppLoadedClickthrough_Msg: Click-through is enabled. You will not be able to click on the interface until you receive a trading whisper.
TrayNotifications.ErrorSavingStatsSameIDExists_Title: Error when trying to save stats
TrayNotifications.ErrorSavingStatsSameIDExists_Msg:
An error occurred when trying to save the stats for this trade.
There is already a trade saved on number "%number%"
The tool will now verify for the next available number. If this error repeatedly, please report it.
TrayNotifications.ErrorSavingStatsSameIDExists_Solved_Msg: The previous warning can be safely ignored.

MessageBoxes.MyStats_ConfirmDeleteThisEntry:
This cannot be reverted.
Are you sure to delete this entry from the stats?

%entry%
MessageBoxes.Settings_ConfirmResetToDefault:
Are you sure to reset your settings to default?
Your current settings file will be kept and renamed, in case you ever want to revert the changes.

The file will be located in "%folder%"
MessageBoxes.Settings_ThisActionCanOnlyBeLast:
This action (%thisAction%) can only be added as the last action for this button. Placing this action anywhere else than last would cause issues.
For "Write..." actions, it would cause issues as the chat window would still be open.
For "Close tab" actions it would cause issues as the tab informations wouldn't be available anymore
Please remove or re-order actions.
MessageBoxes.Settings_LastActionIsWrite: You may not add this action (%thisAction%) because the last action (%lastAction%) only writes the message without sending it. Adding any action after it would cause issues as the chat window would still be open.
MessageBoxes.Settings_LastActionIsCloseTab: You may not add this action (%thisAction%) because the last action (%lastAction%) is closing the tab. Adding any action after it would cause issues as the tab informations wouldn't be available anymore.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveDownBcsLastIsWrite: You cannot move this action down because the last action (%lastAction%) writes a message without sending and therefore must stay the last.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveUpBcsItsWrite: You cannot move this action up because it writes a message without sending and therefore must stay the last.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveDownBcsLastIsCloseTab: You cannot move this action down because the last action (%lastAction%) closes the tab and therefore must stay the last.
MessageBoxes.Settings_CannotMoveUpBcsItsCloseTab: You cannot move this action up because it closes the tab and therefore must stay the last.
MessageBoxes.Settings_ConfirmDeleteAdvHotkeyProfile:
%name% (Hotkey: %hotkey%)
Are you sure to delete this hotkey profile?
MessageBoxes.GameSettingsFileNotFound:
Your production_Config.ini file could not be found!
This file contains all of your Path of Exile settings and is necessary for us to retrieve your chat key.
You will still be able to use this tool but your chat key will be considered as ENTER.
MessageBoxes.ReloadAsAdmin_Msg:
Cannot interact with the game instance (PID "%pid%") because the game is running as admin and the tool is not. To avoid this warning in the future, make sure to start the tool as admin.
Would you like to automatically reload the tool with admin elevation? All tabs will still be there after reloading.
MessageBoxes.UpdatePrompt_Msg:
Current: %version%
Available %update%

Would you like to update now?
The entire updating process is automated.

TEXT_NAME.SEND_TO_LAST_WHISPER: Send to last who whispered you
TEXT_NAME.WRITE_TO_LAST_WHISPER: Write to last who whispered you
TEXT_NAME.CLOSE_SIMILAR_TABS: Close other tabs for same item

DEFAULT_CONTENT.SEND_TO_LAST_WHISPER: Send a message to the last person who whispered you. (Uses the %lwr% Trade Variable)
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SEND_TO_LAST_WHISPER_SENT: Send a message to the last person you whispered. (Uses the %lws% Trade Variable)
DEFAULT_CONTENT.WRITE_MSG: Write a message without sending it into chat.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.WRITE_THEN_GO_BACK: Write a message and go back to {X} so you can write something in-between.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.WRITE_TO_LAST_WHISPER: Write a message to the last person who whispered you without sending it. (Uses the %lwr% Trade Variable)
DEFAULT_CONTENT.WRITE_TO_LAST_WHISPER_SENT: Write a message to the last person you whispered without sending it. (Uses the %lws% Trade Variable)
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SEND_TO_BUYER: Send a message to your buyer.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.WRITE_TO_BUYER: Write a message to your buyer without sending it.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.INVITE_BUYER: Invite your buyer to your party.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.TRADE_BUYER: Send a trade request to your buyer.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.KICK_BUYER: Kick your buyer out of your party.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.KICK_MYSELF: Kick yourself out of current party.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SAVE_TRADE_STATS: Save the trade stats. You can see your saved stats from the Stats tray option.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.COPY_ITEM_INFOS: Copy the tab's item infos, for usage with the in-game stash search.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.TOGGLE_MIN_MAX: Toggle the interface between minimized and maximized.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.FORCE_MIN: Force the interface to go into minimized form.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.FORCE_MAX: Force the interface to go into maximized form.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.IGNORE_SIMILAR_TRADE: Ignore whispers for items with the same price and stash for 10 minutes.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.CLOSE_SIMILAR_TABS: Close any other tab matching the same item, price and stash location.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.CMD_AFK: Send the /afk command into chat. You can write anything next to the command to customize your AFK message.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.CMD_AUTOREPLY: Send the /autoreply command into chat. You can write anything next to the command to customize your autoreply message
DEFAULT_CONTENT.CMD_DND: Send the /dnd command into chat. You can write anything next to the command to customize your DND message
DEFAULT_CONTENT.CMD_WHOIS: Send the /whois command into chat. You can write any name (or Trade Variable) next to the command.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SENDINPUT: Uses AutoHotKey SendInput command instead of directly sending the messages into chat.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SENDINPUT_RAW: Uses AutoHotKey SendInput command with the {Raw} parameter instead of directly sending the messages into chat.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SENDEVENT: Uses AutoHotKey SendEvent command instead of directly sending the messages into chat.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SENDEVENT_RAW: Uses AutoHotKey SendEvent command with the {Raw} parameter instead of directly sending the messages into chat.
DEFAULT_CONTENT.SLEEP: Uses AutoHotkey Sleep command to add a delay before the next action.
